pronunciation: TRANSGRESS', [Latin transgressus, transgredior; trans and gradior, to pass.]

definitions.text:
Transgress
1. To over beyond any limit; surpass.
2. In moral sense, overpass any rule prescribed the limit of duty; break violate law, civil moral. To divine law, is sin. Legislators should not laws of their own making.TRANSGRESS',

To offend by violating law; sin.Chron
2.
